about_the_game:
An unfamiliar and mysterious world. Drowned Lake takes inspiration from Brazilian folklore, exploring themes of religious syncretism and social discontent, all wrapped in a chilling documentary found footage horror experience.

Follow Carolina the reporter, Rafael the first responder, or Leonardo the old fisherman. What begins as a rescue mission quickly spirals into a series of bizarre and disturbing events. As the lake’s dark past comes to light, so do the secrets buried deep within the strangers, forcing them to confront both their inner demons and the sinister presence haunting the lake.

Our Lady Calls

Enter the lake as one of three different characters. Each has their own secrets, motivations, and desires. Our lady whispers sweet promises. Who will answer?

An Oppressive and Immersive Atmosphere

From abandoned wrecks or to quiet streams, a dark presence pervades every inch of the lake. Safety is a dream. It's time to wake up.

Fishing with consequences

You never know what the lake waters may bring... or what they will demand of you. Will you reel in your salvation, or awaken up the terrors below?

Documented Horror

Witness the terror in a unique blend of first person and isometric view. Recover the tapes, piece together the story, and continue Bento's work.

A New Breed of Horror

Drowned Lake Draws from Brazil’s rich folklore, blending local myths, cryptic creatures, and real history into a unique horror experience.

Uncover the mystery. Find the source. Answer the Lady's call. Survive or be consumed... by The Drowned Lake.

name: Drowned Lake

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 @ 3.3GHz (4th Generation)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 TI or AMD Radeon R7 370, with a minimum of 3GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: When Bento, an amateur documentarian vanishes, three strangers are drawn to the Drowned Lake to find him. As the lake’s dark past comes to light, so do the secrets buried deep within them. Explore, survive, and investigate the dark waters in this fishing survival horror game.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Polish
